reviewText: Better suited for couples very well into the social security age group.  As expected, having actors who appear to be amateurs has its pluses and minuses.  Interestingly, it also appears that Viagra was not part of the picture in at least 2 out of 3 scenes.

This dvd proves that sex gets better with age. Aunt Peg aka Juliet Anderson proves just how sexy a woman can be after 50. This video is both erotic and sensual. It should be shown as a means of obtaining intimacy. Love from Both Sides: A True Story of Soul Survival and Sacred Sexuality
This former porn star was better in the Taboo Series.  She was known as Aunt Peg.  I don't recommend this DVD.

For those of you who are not familiar with Juliet Anderson, that is for those of you who didn't get around to watching some of the best porn movies of the late 1970's and early 1980's - Juliet was a sex goddess.  A stunning blonde performer who entered the X-rated movie industry at age 38.  Evenso, no one else had such raw sexual energy and appetite. This coupled with her endless desire to please, always came through in whatever "position" she found herself in. With that said, this dvd is a production that "Aunt Peg" as her fans so affectionately remember her as, produced and co-directed herself.  Now in her late 60's, she's the host and star of the first segment in this three-segment look at sex for the over fifties.

"Ageless Desire" is a sex educational aide rather than a porno movie.  It's carefully designed to show three real couples coming to terms with their sexual needs and adjusting to the physical and mental limits of their age and health.  The couples enjoy sex with humor and care for each others needs as they reach fulfillment on camera.  As with most things, it's not for everyone.  But if you and your partner were more than just thinking of trying to put some spice back into your bedroom or wherever, then by all means allow Juliet (who's still stunning) and her friends to help!
